item.title: Improving the Homepage
item.description: Showing all posts in the homepage As a first modification, I start placing all the posts in the home page, and delete the posts page. For deleting the posts page, I change my hugo.toml from: baseURL = 'marcocarnini.com' languageCode = 'en-us' title = 'Site from scratch' theme = 'bareMinimum' [menu] [[menu.main]] name = "Home" url = "/" weight = 1 [[menu.main]] name = "Posts" url = "/posts/" weight = 2 [[menu.

item.title: Creating a Theme from Scratch
item.description: Starting hugo new site from_scratch The folder themes is empty. Normally, I would clone an existing theme, and start configuring. In this example, however, I want to work step by step on the creation of my personal theme. I follow this guide. hugo new theme bareMinimum leading to the following structure for the folder themes/bareMinimum: bareMinimum/ ├── archetypes │ └── default.md ├── hugo.toml ├── layouts │ ├── 404.html │ ├── _default │ │ ├── baseof.
